
### Git History ###

```{r, include=TRUE, echo=FALSE}
gitlog = .scikick_get_gitlog()
rm(".scikick_get_gitlog")
```

### List of Contributors ###  

```{r, include=TRUE, echo=FALSE}
authors = as.data.frame(table(gitlog$author))
colnames(authors) = c("author", "commits")

knitr::kable(authors, "markdown", align=rep("l", 2))

```

### List of Changes ###  

```{r, include=TRUE, echo=FALSE}

# trim if summary line is too long to fit on screen
gitlog$summary = ifelse(nchar(gitlog$summary) > 80, paste0(strtrim(gitlog$summary, 80), "..."), gitlog$summary)
gitlog$summary = gsub("_", " ", gitlog$summary)
knitr::kable(gitlog, "markdown", align=rep("l", 4))

```
